TopicTitle: I can't get an imgur album to load.

Articles.Content:
I've been working on this for over an hour so I guess it's time to ask. Why doesn't this work?

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/QsKBB/embed"></iframe>

Thanks

Edited October 3, 2013 by Gus

You can't use HTML code on the forums. What you want is to put the album subdirectory code inside "IMGUR" tags, like this (except without the asterisk):

[imgur*]QsKBB[/imgur]

Which should give you:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

THANK YOU.

(I didn't register the "remove the *" at first, but I eventually got it.
Wow, and what mod is that in those picture's you're demonstrating with, Specialist290??

Wow, and what mod is that in those picture's you're demonstrating with, Specialist290??

The pics are showing a few new parts that haven't been released yet in the Hollow Structures and Hulls mod.

Edited October 4, 2013 by Gus
Yeah, that's actually his album, not mine It's the same one as in the OP, just properly formatted.

So...like this?

Javascript is disabled. View full album

EDIT: Sorry, totally works, just wanted to try it here before I confused someone else by referring to a nonexistent album.
Oof. Need moar panels on that rover...first time it flips, KABLOOIE!!!
Thanks, mine had a hashtag on it and then I removed it, worked out fine!
For me it takes me to imgur, but then imgur says that the album I am trying to access does not exist.

Make sure you only use the imgur album code, not the code with the #0 or whatever page or it'll fail.

Also, protip for posting BB code, you can use [noparse][noparse][/noparse][/noparse] to post example code.

For example

[noparse][link]Test.url[/link][/noparse]
